Product Name: Ninja® Professional Plus Blender with Auto-iQ® and 72-oz.* Total Crushing Pitcher & Lid, BN700
Product Description: The Ninja® Professional Plus Blender with Auto-iQ® utilizes a 1200-watt motor to power through any tough ingredient. Ninja Total Crushing® Blades give you perfectly crushed ice for your smoothies and frozen drinks. Auto-iQ Technology provides preset programs which combine pulsing, blending, and pausing patterns that do the work for you. The 72 oz.* Total Crushing Pitcher is great for making large batches for the whole family. *64 oz. max liquid capacity\n- FAMILY-SIZED CAPACITY: The full 72 oz.** XL pitcher is perfect for large batches of delicious margaritas, daiquiris, shakes, and smoothies. - 1200-WATT MOTOR: Powerful motor crushes ice into snow in seconds for your favorite smoothies, frozen drinks, and more. - STACKED BLADE ASSEMBLY: Fully breaks down whole foods, and frozen ingredients, unlocking the full potential of your fruits and veggies. By blending whole fruits and vegetables including portions that are usually discarded. - INTELLIGENT PRESET PROGRAMS: 2 Auto-iQ programs combine unique pulsing and pausing patterns to deliver perfect results without the guessworkat the touch of a button. - CLEAN WITH EASE: Pitcher, lid, and blades are BPAfree and dishwasher safe. - COOKBOOK: Inspiration guide with 15 recipes to get you started. - WHAT'S INCLUDED: 72 oz.** XL Pitcher with Lid, Stacked Blade Assembly, and Inspiration Guide. - *Versus BL610, based on operating wattage
